text: The Regional Mexican Albums, published in Billboard magazine, is a record chart that features Latin music sales information for regional styles of Mexican music. This data are compiled by Nielsen SoundScan from a sample that includes music stores, music departments at department stores, verifiable sales from concert venues and track equivalent album units and streaming equivalent album units in the United States. ==Chart history== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |+Key | |Indicates best performing regional mexican album of 2018 |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !
